Name: Black Angel Riding
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Move at a noticeably fast speed with a Black Angel's wings that enable Double Jump.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Move at a noticeably fast speed with a Black Angel's wings that enable Double Jump. Double-click a location on the World Map, and you'll automatically fly to the destination by following the navigation line. (Auto-pilot is only available in certain continents, such as Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Riding Authorization Continents by purchasing Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Move at a noticeably fast speed with a Black Angel's wings that enable Double Jump.
